amendment.description: To provide that Members of Congress shall not receive a cost of living adjustment in pay during fiscal year 2003.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1904 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 34. Record Vote Number: 406.

Amendment SA 1904 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S13087-13089; text: CR S13087) To provide that Members of Congress shall not receive a cost of living adjustment in pay during fiscal year 2003.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1904 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 34. Record Vote Number: 406.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1904 proposed by Senator Feingold.
